title: #103: Sahara Rose - Ayurveda 101, Body Imbalance, Doshas, Tongue Scraping, Dream Meanings, and Knowing What Works With Your System
itunes:title: #103: Sahara Rose - Ayurveda 101, Body Imbalance, Doshas, Tongue Scraping, Dream Meanings, and Knowing What Works With Your System
description:
On this episode we sit down with Sahara Rose who is the best-selling author of the Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda. On this episode we discuss our Doshas, what doshas are, the history of Ayurveda, diet, body imbalance, tongue scraping and the meaning of our dreams. 

 

To connect with Sahara Rose click HERE

To connect with Lauryn Evarts click HERE

To connect with Michael Bosstick click HERE

Read More on The Skinny Confidential HERE
